import email, sys, os

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import email, sys, os
from email import policy

fn = 'urgent.eml'
if not os.path.exists(fn):
    print('urgent.eml not found', file=sys.stderr)
    sys.exit(1)

with open(fn, 'rb') as f:
    msg = email.message_from_binary_file(f, policy=policy.default)

saved = []
# Save attachments (with filename)
for part in msg.iter_attachments():
    filename = part.get_filename()
    if not filename:
        filename = 'attachment-{}.bin'.format(len(saved)+1)
    data = part.get_payload(decode=True)
    with open(filename, 'wb') as out:
        out.write(data)
    print('Wrote', filename)
    saved.append(filename)

# Also try to save the main html body (inline text/html without disposition)
for part in msg.walk():
    ctype = part.get_content_type()
    disp = part.get_content_disposition()
    if ctype == 'text/html' and disp is None:
        data = part.get_payload(decode=True)
        if data:
            with open('body.html', 'wb') as out:
                out.write(data)
            print('Wrote body.html')
            break
EOF

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import email, sys, os
from email import policy

fn = 'urgent.eml'
if not os.path.exists(fn):
    print('urgent.eml not found', file=sys.stderr)
    sys.exit(1)

with open(fn, 'rb') as f:
    msg = email.message_from_binary_file(f, policy=policy.default)

saved = []
# Save attachments (with filename)
for part in msg.iter_attachments():
    filename = part.get_filename()
    if not filename:
        filename = 'attachment-{}.bin'.format(len(saved)+1)
    data = part.get_payload(decode=True)
    with open(filename, 'wb') as out:
        out.write(data)
    print('Wrote', filename)
    saved.append(filename)

# Also try to save the main html body (inline text/html without disposition)
for part in msg.walk():
    ctype = part.get_content_type()
    disp = part.get_content_disposition()
    if ctype == 'text/html' and disp is None:
        data = part.get_payload(decode=True)
        if data:
            with open('body.html', 'wb') as out:
                out.write(data)
            print('Wrote body.html')
            break
